title: Anbernic RG35XX 2024: A Meaningless Refresh?
content: Anbernic's RG35XX 2024 offers nothing beyond its predecessor, the 35XX Plus. Containing the same hardware but lacking wireless connectivity, one could argue that it is basically e-waste. Sadly, it is in character for Anbernic to add yet another generic, uninspired device to an already cluttered market.
